containerDefinitions.name: instance-id-getter
command:
i=0; while true; do echo "$i: $(date) $(wget -q -O- http://instance/index.txt)
" >> /tmp/ids.htm; echo "

Below are observed instance ids and the time they were observed; refresh the page to see the current list.

$(cat /tmp/ids.htm | sort -nr)" > /nginx/index.html; sleep 3; i=$((i+1)); done
